articles.title: "She Calls Him Shaitan": Usman Khawaja After Retiring David Warner Hugs His Mother | Cricket News - NDTV Sports
articles.description: David Warner formed a great opening pair with his fellow teammate Usman Khawaja. The duo provided a strong base to Australia's batting line-up for several years.
articles.content: Australia star opener David Warner bid adieu to Test cricket as he played his last match in the longest format on Saturday against Pakistan. Warner scored 57 off 75 balls and helped Australia clinch … [+1607 chars]
